name: Random # Number Generator
description:
Generate all your lucky and random numbers with ease.

Our random number generator comes in five different flavors:
1. Random #: Generate a random number between two chosen numbers, for example, a random number between 1 and 1000.
2. Random 1 to 10: Randomly generate a rating out of 10.
3. Random 00 to 99: Generate a random score between 00 and 99.
4. Lucky Numbers: Generate up to 12 lucky numbers at a time, for example, 6 lucky numbers from between 1 and 45.
5. Multiple Choice: Provides a random answer to your multiple choice questions, randomly generate an answer from A to D.

Simple and fun!
